message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This unique item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. It comes equipped with cutting-edge features designed to enhance your experience. Considering its exceptional value and capabilities, we are offering it to you for $20000. We believe this price reflects not only the cost of production but also the superior quality and benefits you will receive. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality and features of your product. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $15000 for this purchase. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15000?
